item.title: 5,760 亿美元股票-ETF 巨头遭遇极端动荡
item.description: 在周三历史性的交易时段结束时，全球最大的交易所交易基金之一的股价与其持有的标的资产相比，出现了自 2008 年以来最大的溢价。【原文：One of the largest exchange-traded funds in the world was left at the widest premium to its underlying holdings since 2008 at the end of Wednesday’s historic session.】

item.title: YouTube明星IShowSpeed用未来派中国技术吸引美国消费者
item.description: 随着华为技术有限公司（Huawei Technologies Co.）和比亚迪股份有限公司（BYD Co.【原文：American streamer IShowSpeed’s visit to China has sparked widespread curiosity among fans about cutting-edge advancements in Chinese technology, as products from Huawei Technologies Co. and BYD Co. are put in the spotlight.】

item.title: 英国和法国将加快乌克兰部队的军事规划
item.description: 英国国防大臣约翰-希利（John Healey）和法国国防部长塞巴斯蒂安-勒科尔努（Sébastien Lecornu）告诉记者，英国和法国将在未来两周内加快 "意愿联盟 "的军事规划，重点确保乌克兰海陆空的安全及其部队的复兴。【原文：The UK and France will accelerate the military planning of the “coalition of the willing” over the next two weeks to focus on ensuring the security of Ukraine’s air, sea and land as well as the regeneration of its forces, UK Defense Secretary John Healey and French Defense Minister Sébastien Lecornu told reporters.】

item.title: 加拿大寻求石油安全，TC 能源公司排除主线出售计划
item.description: TC Energy Corp.首席执行官弗朗索瓦-普瓦里耶排除了出售加拿大主干线天然气管道的可能性，因为与美国的贸易战将能源安全推到了加拿大政界人士的优先位置。【原文：TC Energy Corp. Chief Executive Francois Poirier ruled out selling the Canadian Mainline natural gas pipeline — which stretches across most of the country — as the trade war with the US pushes energy security up Canadian politicians’ priority list.】

item.title: 美国在赤字扩大的情况下关税略有上升
item.description: 随着美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税上调政策开始生效，美国财政部上个月的关税略有上升，但与持续扩大的财政赤字相比，这一增长显得微不足道。【原文：The US Treasury saw a modest pickup in customs duties last month as President Donald Trump’s tariff hikes began to kick in, though the bump paled against a continued widening in the fiscal deficit.】

item.title: 旧金山市长旨在解决城市财政问题
item.description: 旧金山市长丹尼尔-卢里（Daniel Lurie）表示，在特朗普政府的贸易战有可能扰乱全球经济之际，他将集中精力解决该市的预算赤字问题。【原文：San Francisco Mayor Daniel Lurie said he will focus on tackling his city’s budget deficit, as the Trump administration’s trade war threatens to disrupt the global economy.】

item.title: 贸易战风险：满足未来需求所需的铜投资
item.description: 铜产业正在关注世界最大经济体之间不断升级的贸易战将如何影响满足未来对配线金属需求所需的投资。【原文：The copper industry is turning attention to how the escalating trade war between the world’s biggest economies will affect investments needed to meet future demand for the wiring metal.】

item.title: Tropicana 债务交易将债权人分为赢家和输家
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Tropicana Brands Group 敲定了一项交易，由一组特定的贷款人担保，这家陷入困境的果汁生产商将获得 4 亿美元的新现金。【原文：Tropicana Brands Group finalized a deal that saw a select group of lenders guarantee that the struggling juice maker would get $400 million in fresh cash, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 特朗普的威胁让移民争相将现金带离美国
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）威胁要驱逐数百万在美国的移民工人，这使中美洲的移民工人资金流激增。【原文：Central America is seeing a surge in money flows from migrant workers in the US who are spooked by Donald Trump’s threats to deport millions of them.】

item.title: 纽伯格汇集私人基金股权，融资 12 亿美元
item.description: 纽伯格伯曼集团（Neuberger Berman Group）出售了约 12 亿美元的证券，这些证券由其监管的一系列基金的现金流支持，此举将为该资产管理公司腾出更多资金。【原文：Neuberger Berman Group has sold around $1.2 billion of securities backed by cash flows from a series of funds it oversees, a move that will free up more money for the asset manager.】

item.title: 鲍曼敦促监管机构在金融系统目标上保持一致
item.description: 美联储理事米歇尔-鲍曼（Michelle Bowman）周四在参议院银行委员会表示，她将对新的银行业规则进行成本效益分析，监管机构应在金融体系的目标上保持一致。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Michelle Bowman told the Senate Banking Committee Thursday that she will apply cost-benefit analysis to new banking rules and that regulators should be aligned in their goals for the financial system.】

item.title: 达拉斯联储经济学家称打击移民有可能冲击美国 GDP 和物价
item.description: 根据达拉斯联邦储备银行（Federal Reserve Bank of Dallas）的最新预测，唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统承诺的打击移民政策对美国经济增长造成的负面影响有可能超过许多经济学家的预期。【原文：President Donald Trump’s promised immigration crackdown risks crimping US economic growth by more than many economists expect, according to new projections from the Federal Reserve Bank of Dallas.】

item.title: 市场走低，比特币与美股的联系重新缩减
item.description: 在贸易紧张局势升级再次席卷金融市场之际，加密货币恢复了与美股的紧密关联。【原文：Crytocurrencies resumed a tight correlation with US stocks at a most inopportune moment, with each tumbling as escalating trade tensions engulf financial markets again.】

item.title: 阿根廷在贝森特访华前续签部分中国交换协议
item.description: 就在美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）访问南美国家与哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）总统会晤的前几天，阿根廷与中国续签了部分 180 亿美元的货币互换额度。【原文：Argentina renewed a portion of its $18 billion currency swap line with China just days before US Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent visits the South American nation to meet President Javier Milei.】

item.title: 荷兰国家统计局称，荷兰寻求软化有争议的租金管制措施
item.description: 荷兰政府试图放松有争议的房租控制措施，批评者认为这些措施加剧了该国的住房危机。【原文：The Dutch government seeks to loosen controversial rent control measures which critics say exacerbated the country’s housing crisis.】

item.title: 美国下调 2025 年全球石油需求增长预期
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税举措给经济前景蒙上了一层阴影，美国下调了对全球石油需求增长和国内原油产量的预测。【原文：The US slashed its forecasts for global oil demand growth and domestic crude production as US President Donald Trump’s tariff moves puts a cloud over the economic outlook.】

item.title: 古尔斯比称关税给美联储带来滞胀冲击
item.description: 芝加哥联邦储备银行行长 Austan Goolsbee 说，关税是一种 "滞胀冲击"，使中央银行的价格稳定和充分就业目标相互对立。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Chicago President Austan Goolsbee said tariffs are a “stagflationary shock” and they pit the central bank’s goals of price stability and full employment against one another.】

item.title: 墨西哥央行称美国贸易关税可能削弱经济增长前景
item.description: 墨西哥央行成员认为，部分由于美国关税的不确定性，今年经济走弱的可能性较大，这种展望包含了更大的衰退可能性，但有助于抑制通胀。【原文：Mexico central bank members see odds of a weaker economy this year due in part to US tariff uncertainty, an outlook that incorporates greater chances of recession but can help tame inflation.】

item.title: 软件公司 Canva 下注新的人工智能创意产品与 Adobe 竞争
item.description: 设计软件提供商 Canva Inc. 发布了增强其人工智能生成产品的产品，在首次公开募股之际寻求吸引竞争对手 Adobe Inc. 的企业客户。【原文：Design software provider Canva Inc. unveiled products to boost its generative artificial intelligence offerings, seeking to attract corporate customers away from rival Adobe Inc. as it heads toward an initial public offering.】

item.title: 据说加拿大官员计划在特朗普投诉后与美国银行会面
item.description: 据知情人士透露，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普抱怨美国银行在加拿大开展业务遇到困难之后，加拿大政府已邀请包括摩根大通银行在内的美国银行代表举行会议。【原文：The Canadian government has invited representatives from US banks including JPMorgan Chase & Co. for a meeting, according to people with knowledge of the matter, after US President Donald Trump complained that American banks have trouble doing business in Canada.】

item.title: 雷-达里奥称关税动荡损害了美国的可靠性声誉
item.description: 桥水公司（Bridgewater Associates）的亿万富翁创始人雷-达里奥（Ray Dalio）说，本周全球市场动荡不安，给投资者留下了 "创伤、震惊或恐惧的因素"。【原文：Bridgewater Associates’ billionaire founder Ray Dalio said investors have been left with “an element of trauma or shock or fear” after all the global markets turmoil this week.】

item.title: 利洁时家庭护理产品收购方在关税忧虑下降低估值
item.description: 利洁时集团（Reckitt Benckiser Group Plc）去年开始出售家庭护理品牌组合，包括 Air Wick 和 Cillit Bang 等家喻户晓的品牌，尽管标价高达 60 亿英镑（77 亿美元），但还是吸引了众多私募股权收购者。【原文：When Reckitt Benckiser Group Plc set out last year to sell a portfolio of homecare brands, including household names such as Air Wick and Cillit Bang, it drew a bevy of private equity suitors despite a hefty £6 billion ($7.7 billion) price tag.】

item.title: 特朗普的制造业梦想与企业主的现实发生冲突
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普上周表示，他将利用关税来重塑美国的贸易政策，促进国内制造业的发展，企业家埃维塔-朱（Evita Chu）便开始四处打听，看能否将她从中国和欧洲购买的一些纱线转运到美国。【原文：When President Donald Trump said last week that he was using tariffs to remake American trade policy and bolster domestic manufacturing, entrepreneur Evita Chu started calling around to see if she could source some of the yarn she buys from China and Europe in the US instead.】

item.title: 西班牙裔消费者的压力损害了 Modelo 和 Corona 啤酒的销量
item.description: Modelo Especial 和 Corona 的销售商星座品牌公司（Constellation Brands Inc.【原文：Modelo Especial and Corona seller Constellation Brands Inc. said concern among Hispanic consumers over inflation, immigration and job security is weighing on demand for beer.】

item.title: Aptior 表示：欧洲信贷吸引投资者远离美国
item.description: 投资公司Aptior Capital称，由于担心唐纳德-特朗普的贸易战及其对经济的潜在影响，投资者正在转向欧洲不良信贷，以分散对美国的投资。【原文：Investors are turning to European distressed credits as they diversify away from the US amid concerns over Donald Trump’s trade war and its potential impact on the economy, according to investment firm Aptior Capital.】

item.title: 瑞士法郎创 2015 年以来最大涨幅，日元因抢滩避险天堂而上涨
item.description: 瑞郎周四创下十年来最大涨幅，原因是投资者又开始转向避风港，而美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的贸易战继续给市场带来波动，使全球经济增长前景暗淡。【原文：The Swiss franc rallied Thursday by the most in a decade as investors started shifting into havens again while President Donald Trump’s trade war continues to sow volatility in markets by darkening the outlook for global growth.】

item.title: 摩根大通分析师的 "改编 "报告道出了对特朗普的担忧
item.description: 被杰米-戴蒙（Jamie Dimon）称赞为 "我们公司最伟大的思想家之一 "的摩根大通（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：A JPMorgan Chase & Co. strategist who Jamie Dimon has lauded as “one of our firm’s great thinkers” is taking an unusual approach to highlight fears on Wall Street over speaking out against the Trump administration.】

item.title: 瑞士国家银行舒丁支持现金，同时呼吁即时支付
item.description: 瑞士国家银行理事会成员 Petra Tschudin 重申了该机构对纸币的承诺，同时她还赞扬了瑞士即时支付系统的优点。【原文：Swiss National Bank Governing Board member Petra Tschudin reaffirmed her institution’s commitment to banknotes, even as she extolled the virtues of Switzerland’s instant payment system.】

item.title: 交易员应对特朗普逆转后数十年来最动荡的股票市场
item.description: 华尔街又一次惨遭逆转，这一次，标准普尔 500 指数下跌 5%，抹去了周三历史性涨幅的一半，这暴露了投资者在试图驾驭现代史上最不连贯的贸易政策时所面临的困难。【原文：Another brutal reversal on Wall Street, this one a 5% rout in the S&P 500 that wiped out half of Wednesday’s historic gains, has laid bare the difficulties facing investors trying to navigate one of the least coherent trade policies in modern history.】

item.title: 油价暴跌暂时不会打破普京的战争机器
item.description: 最近的油价暴跌不会改变俄罗斯为其战争机器提供资金的能力，因为非能源行业收入的增加和雨天储备有助于抵消损失。【原文：The recent plunge in oil prices won’t be a game changer for Russia’s ability to finance its war machine as rising revenue from non-energy sectors and rainy-day reserves help offset losses.】
